text: @Milbank NO NO NO.  He called out the politicizing of COVID-19 like you  asshole. THE REAL PROBLEM IS THE MAJORITY OF MEDICAL SUPPLIES IS IN CHINA.  WE NEED THEM MADE HERE IN THE STATES.
